attributes.action: Strongly Condemning HATEFUL & VIOLENT speech by British Citizen "Altaf Hussain"
attributes.additional_details: Citizens of Pakistan - would like to appeal and Seek justice from the Dept. of Foreign and Commonwealth Office to take strong actions against self exiled citizen of United Kingdom, Altaf Hussain - for delivering hateful, threatening and violent speech against the Citizens of Pakistan... These elements who inculcate hatred and bring instability to peaceful society should be punished.
